name: af4-agrilife-unit
description: AgriLife variation of the AgriFlex4 theme

scripts.start: git config core.hooksPath hooks && chmod u+x ./hooks/pre-commit && composer install && npm install && grunt
scripts.checkwp: npm run configphpcs && npm run checkphp
scripts.configphpcs: vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths vendor/wp-coding-standards/wpcs && vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set ignore_errors_on_exit 1 && vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set ignore_warnings_on_exit 1

author: Zachary Watkins
